functions.tag: {display:{Name:"{\"text\":\"Desiccating Carapace\",\"color\":\"dark_purple\",\"italic\":false}",Lore:['{"text":"Old, dead and ready to crumble, it","color":"gray"}','{"text":"holds just enough water to refill an","color":"gray"}','{"text":"empty flask. The dreadful arthropods","color":"gray"}','{"text":"that leave these behind are brimming","color":"gray"}','{"text":"with biological stimulants, but use","color":"gray"}','{"text":"them not for noble intent.","color":"gray"}','{"text":"--------","color":"gray"}','{"text":"Hold in Hand With an Empty Flask","color":"gray"}','{"text":"Fills the Empty Flask","color":"gray"}','{"text":"Cooldown: 2min","color":"gray"}']},HoldingID:77}
